data.title: An Australian athlete who has competed in six Paralympic Games has been robbed at gunpoint in the Brazilian city of Rio de Janeiro. Liesl Tesch said a man brandishing a gun pushed her off her bicycle and stole it on Sunday.

In 2015, 50 environmentalists were killed in Brazil – more than a quarter of those killed worldwide – and last year marked deadliest year for environmental activists, with 185 total murders across world. Out of the 10 deadliest countries in world for environmentalist, seven were in Latin America.

Seafile, a German file-syncing service similar to Dropbox, has announced that Paypal is demanding that they monitor customer data for "illegal" content in violation of German law.

Coral bleaching event now biggest in history – and about to get worse: 'Coral in every major reef region has already experienced severe bleaching. About 93% of the reefs on Australia’s Great Barrier Reef have been affected, and almost a quarter of the reef on the 2,300km stretch is now dead.'
